mapper.sql: ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, PLAN_ITEM_NO, ITEM_NO, DISP_DATE, REACH_TIME, REACH_TIME_TYPE, MATNR, UNIT, QTY, PRICE, AMT, REMAIN_AMT, STATUS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT,GIFT_QTY,PROMOTION_FLAG
mapper.select: select d.ORDER_NO, d.ORDER_DATE, d.PLAN_ITEM_NO, d.ITEM_NO, d.DISP_DATE, d.REACH_TIME, d.REACH_TIME_TYPE, d.MATNR, UNIT, d.QTY, d.PRICE, d.AMT, d.REMAIN_AMT, d.STATUS, d.CREATE_AT, d.CREATE_BY, d.CREATE_BY_TXT, d.LAST_MODIFIED, d.LAST_MODIFIED_BY, d.LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT, p.MATNR_TXT MATNR_TXT from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item d , t_md_mara p ,t_preorder o where d.MATNR = p.MATNR and o.ORDER_NO = d.ORDER_NO and o.SALES_ORG = p.SALES_ORG and d.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by d.DISP_DATE

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where 1 = 1 and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where 1 = 1 and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by DISP_DATE desc

select
from t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item where 1 = 1 and ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by DISP_DATE asc
mapper.insert: insert into t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item (ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, PLAN_ITEM_NO, ITEM_NO, DISP_DATE, REACH_TIME, REACH_TIME_TYPE, MATNR, UNIT, QTY, PRICE, AMT, REMAIN_AMT, STATUS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT) values (#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{reachTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
ORDER_NO,
ORDER_DATE,

mapper.update:
update t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
DISP_DATE = #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE},
REACH_TIME = #{reachTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REACH_TIME_TYPE = #{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATNR = #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMAIN_AMT = #{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY_TXT = #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DISP_DATE = #{dispDate,jdbcType=DATE}
and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_mst_order_daliy_plan_item
REACH_TIME_TYPE = #{reachTimeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATNR = #{matnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QTY = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMAIN_AMT = #{remainAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_BY_TXT = #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_NO = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ITEM_NO = #{itemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PLAN_ITEM_NO = #{planItemNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
